name: Arin's Quest
description:
Help Arin in his quest for job security in this hopefully decent new game!

Controls: Explained in-game, but Arrow keys to move, 'Z' to jump and skip through text boxes faster, 'X' to run, and the 'Up Arrow' to interact with stuff.

Additional Controls: M to mute the game, and L to mute just the music.

P.S: to use unlocked cheats, press 'escape' to go the the main menu, use the number keys to select the cheat, and then go to the 'load game' button to load your game. If they don't work, then refreshing your browser should fix it.

IMPORTANT NOTE: If the loading % during the beginning of the game gets stuck, just refresh the page. That should fix the issue.

*Originally Made for the Minimalistic Jam 3*
